channel.title: Newbie in need of pro helper :)
channel.description:
Hey guys.
well i might start off saying that im pretty much a noob with java but im working on it and trying my best to learn it asap.
The reason why i made this topic is cuz im trying to make a test server, with the 562 and i found this amazing one that i rly want to get working on but now i was wondering if i could get some help with the problems im having with it :)
Short info:
26-1-13: Started canoes. 26-1-13: Added a lot of more NPC spawns to real locations (over 80). 26-1-13: Fixed Dragon Scimitar + Korasi's Sword attack animations and maul animations. 26-1-13: Started advanced character creation system. 26-1-13: Spirit tree teleportation, corrected it and it's fully finished. 27-1-13: Finished Player Safety -exams (Questions, rewarding, handling). 27-1-13: Finished Experience lamps, antique lamps and so on. (Has media about it.) 28-1-13: Explorer jack is complete (Guy who gives some little tasks for newcomers). 28-1-13: Added Varrock museum display cases including a system for Kudos. 28-1-13: Warning system started, i'm planning to start 2011 tutorial system also. 29-1-13: Finished warning toggling and un-toggling system, it's perfected and fully done. 29-1-13: Added buckets + fillables and emptying. 29-1-13: Added more World NPC and animated over 90 new npcs. 29-1-13: Added dialogues, most of lumbridge has about 80% dialogues. 09-1-13: Completed more dialogues, lumbridge contains 95% of all dialogues. 09-1-13: Nearly 100% player dueling. + Some more i didn't list also this contains most of Dementhium features.
it has 2 worlds [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/1qstg9.jpg[/img]
but when i try to open them i get this error and was wondering why this is happening and if there is anyway to fix it (note* i can start it if i dont go to world selections and just press "click here to play" right away when i login. [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/24yv7gi.jpg[/img] about the rest of the server everything so far works like it should.
most of the npcs work and so should the quests if im not wrong havent tried em yet :) [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2wr26p4.jpg[/img]
if anyone knows anything or has any ideas pls write :)
and for u guys to get a better look at it here is the the full server file: [url=http://www.multiupload.nl/RRY7OO3CNR]http://www.multiupload.nl/RRY7OO3CNR[/url]

item.title: Newbie in need of pro helper :)
item.dc:creator: @dannymoparscape dannymoparscape
item.description:
@dannymoparscape wrote:

hello,
1st you have skype i maight can help danny.overesch
2st what does the cmd log says from client.
3rd ught idk why i did post it

Read full topic

item.description:
@nerkanox wrote:

Hey guys.

well i might start off saying that im pretty much a noob with java but im working on it and trying my best to learn it asap.

The reason why i made this topic is cuz im trying to make a test server, with the 562 and i found this amazing one that i rly want to get working on but now i was wondering if i could get some help with the problems im having with it

Short info:

26-1-13: Started canoes.
26-1-13: Added a lot of more NPC spawns to real locations (over 80).
26-1-13: Fixed Dragon Scimitar + Korasi’s Sword attack animations and maul animations.
26-1-13: Started advanced character creation system.
26-1-13: Spirit tree teleportation, corrected it and it’s fully finished.
27-1-13: Finished Player Safety -exams (Questions, rewarding, handling).
27-1-13: Finished Experience lamps, antique lamps and so on. (Has media about it.)
28-1-13: Explorer jack is complete (Guy who gives some little tasks for newcomers).
28-1-13: Added Varrock museum display cases including a system for Kudos.
28-1-13: Warning system started, i’m planning to start 2011 tutorial system also.
29-1-13: Finished warning toggling and un-toggling system, it’s perfected and fully done.
29-1-13: Added buckets + fillables and emptying.
29-1-13: Added more World NPC and animated over 90 new npcs.
29-1-13: Added dialogues, most of lumbridge has about 80% dialogues.
09-1-13: Completed more dialogues, lumbridge contains 95% of all dialogues.
09-1-13: Nearly 100% player dueling.

  • Some more i didn’t list also this contains most of Dementhium features.

it has 2 worlds

1qstg9.jpg778×551

but when i try to open them i get this error and was wondering why this is happening and if there is anyway to fix it (note* i can start it if i dont go to world selections and just press “click here to play” right away when i login.

24yv7gi.jpg774×560

about the rest of the server everything so far works like it should.

most of the npcs work and so should the quests if im not wrong havent tried em yet

2wr26p4.jpg781×563

if anyone knows anything or has any ideas pls write

and for u guys to get a better look at it here is the the full server file: http://www.multiupload.nl/RRY7OO3CNR
